articles.title: Shocking! CME with SEVERE solar storm potential hits Solar Orbiter satellite at 1500 km per second - HT Tech
articles.description: A farside CME struck the European Space Agency’s (ESA) Solar Orbiter at the speed of 1500 km/s. The CME was powerful enough to spark a severe solar storm on Earth. Check details.
articles.content: After the Earth was struck by two different coronal mass ejection (CME) clouds in successive days, many believed this was the end of the Sun's assault during the week at hand. But another event has s… [+2358 chars]

articles.title: India-Japan forge strategic ties to strengthen semiconductor manufacturing, supply chains | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India and Japan have discussed collaboration in areas such as semiconductors, supply chains, aiming for $35.9bn Japanese investment in India by 2027. The talks also focused on enhancing cooperation in defence equipment and technology.
articles.content: Indian and Japanese officials held discussions in New Delhi, exploring potential collaboration in crucial areas such as semiconductors and establishing robust supply chains. The talks aimed at achiev… [+3597 chars]

articles.author: IANS
articles.title: Self-spreading malware infecting Call of Duty players, caution urged - Telangana Today
articles.description: On June 26, a player of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 warned other players on a Steam forum that hackers "attack using hacked lobbies," and advised using an antivirus, reports TechCrunch.

articles.title: NASA telescopes track 170-foot asteroid charging towards Earth for a close approach - HT Tech
articles.description: Asteroid 2018 BG5, which is the size of an aircraft, is expected to make its closest approach to Earth today. Know details, as per NASA.
